mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.user_oid, u.login, u.activated, u.status, u.leaving_date, u.language, u.password_hash password, c.full_name, c.employee_id, c.title, c.duty, c.rank, c.email, c.corporation_oid, c.direct_manager, cc.id company_id, cc.company_oid, cc.set_of_books_id, cc.tenant_id, cc.company_code, cc.name company_name, p.PHONE_NUMBER mobile, d.name department_name, d.department_oid, d.id department_id FROM art_user u LEFT JOIN art_contact c ON c.id = u.contact_id LEFT JOIN art_company cc ON cc.id = u.company_id LEFT JOIN art_department_user du ON du.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN art_department d ON d.id = du.department_id LEFT JOIN art_phone p ON (c.id = p.contact_id AND p.is_primary = 1) WHERE 1 = 1 AND u.is_deleted = FALSE AND c.email = #{email}
